components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in United States for a  Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Multiple Networks in United States for a  subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue of SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in United States for a  Subset of Short codes. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Network in Colombia via  Subset of Longcodes

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in Colombia via  a subset of long code phone numbers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue of SMS delivery delays to multiple networks in Colombia via  a subset of long code phone numbers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Invoice Bulk Download Failure in Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue causing Invoices created before 2023-08 to not be downloaded using bulk downloader feature from the console and will provide the fix on February 11. We will provide an update on February 11 at 10 am Pacific time.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue causing Invoices created before 2023-08 to not be downloaded using bulk downloader feature from the console and will provide the fix on February 10. We will provide an update on February 10 at 9 am Pacific time.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination SMS Carrier Maintenance - Claro

incident_updates.body: The Claro network in El Salvador, Nicaragua, Costa Rica and Honduras is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 February 2025 at 20:00 PST until 10 February 2025 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Claro El Salvador, Nicaragua, Costa Rica and Honduras handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 February 2025 at 14:00 PST until 11 February 2025 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Norway, France, Croatia, Italy, the Netherlands, Estonia, Hungary, Bulgaria, Denmark, Indonesia, the United Kingdom, the Czech Republic, Mexico, Ukraine, Austria, Costa Rica, Brazil, Finland, Ireland, Peru and Sweden is conducting an emergency maintenance from 15 February 2025 at 14:00 PST until 15 February 2025 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Norway, France, Croatia, Italy, Netherlands, Estonia, Hungary, Bulgaria, Denmark, Indonesia, United Kingdom, Czech Republic, Mexico, Ukraine, Austria, Costa Rica, Brazil, Finland, Ireland, Peru and Sweden phone numbers.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 February 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 03 February 2025 at 16:00 PST
05 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 05 February 2025 at 16:00 PST
10 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 10 February 2025 at 16:00 PST
12 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 12 February 2025 at 16:00 PST
17 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 17 February 2025 at 16:00 PST
19 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 19 February 2025 at 16:00 PST
24 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 24 February 2025 at 16:00 PST
26 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 February 2025 at 16:00 PST
